languages.text: "Мой сон хранит Лекс Империалис, сестра. Пока я служу закону Его, я не знаю сомнений".
"My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His Law, I am untroubled by doubt."
languages.original_text: "Мой сон хранит Лекс Империалис, сестра. Пока я служу закону Его, я не знаю сомнений".

traits.locale_text: "My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His law, I am untroubled by doubt."
"My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His law, I am untroubled by doubt."

"My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His Law, I am untroubled by doubt."

languages.text: 「シスター、俺の眠りはレックス・インペリアによって守られている。法に仕える限り、疑念に悩まされることはない」
languages.original_text: "My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His Law, I am untroubled by doubt."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター、俺の眠りはレックス・インペリアによって守られている。法に仕える限り、疑念に悩まされることはない」

languages.text: "Mein Schlaf wird vom Lex Imperia bewacht, Schwester. Solange ich dem Gesetz des Imperators diene, plagen mich keinerlei Zweifel."
languages.original_text: "My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His Law, I am untroubled by doubt."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Schlaf wird vom Lex Imperia bewacht, Schwester. Solange ich dem Gesetz des Imperators diene, plagen mich keinerlei Zweifel."

languages.text: « La Lex Imperialis veille sur mon sommeil, sœur Argenta. Tant que je sers la loi de l'Empereur, aucun doute ne vient troubler mon esprit. »
languages.original_text: "My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His Law, I am untroubled by doubt."

traits.locale_text: « La Lex Imperialis veille sur mon sommeil, sœur Argenta. Tant que je sers la loi de l'Empereur, aucun doute ne vient troubler mon esprit. »
« La Lex Imperialis veille sur mon sommeil, sœur Argenta. Tant que je sers la loi de l'Empereur, aucun doute ne vient troubler mon esprit. »

languages.text: «La Lex Imperialis vela por mi sueño, hermana. Mientras sirva a Su justicia, mi conciencia está limpia como una patena».
languages.original_text: "My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His Law, I am untroubled by doubt."

traits.locale_text: «La Lex Imperialis vela por mi sueño, hermana. Mientras sirva a Su justicia, mi conciencia está limpia como una patena».

languages.text: “我的良心自有帝国法典守护，修女。只要我忠实服从祂的律法，我的心里就没有任何疑惑。”
languages.original_text: "My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His Law, I am untroubled by doubt."

traits.locale_text: “我的良心自有帝国法典守护，修女。只要我忠实服从祂的律法，我的心里就没有任何疑惑。”

languages.text: "Uykum, Lex İmperialis'e emanettir Rahibe. O'nun Yasası adına hizmet ettiğim sürece vesveseye düşmem."
languages.original_text: "My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His Law, I am untroubled by doubt."

traits.locale_text: "Uykum, Lex İmperialis'e emanettir Rahibe. O'nun Yasası adına hizmet ettiğim sürece vesveseye düşmem."
"Uykum, Lex İmperialis'e emanet Rahibe. O'nun kanunları adına hizmet ettiğim sürece vesveseye düşmem."

languages.original_text: "My sleep is guarded by the Lex Imperialis, Sister. So long as I serve His Law, I am untroubled by doubt."
